  • Constructor Details

    • SnakeGame

      public SnakeGame(int arenaDim, int snakeHeadSize, boolean rasterizacao, int foodSize, String foodType, int foodScore, String obstacles, IGameUI gameUI, String leaderboard)
      Snake game constructor
      Parameters:
      arenaDim - Represents the dimension of the arena
      snakeHeadSize - Represents the size of the snakeHead in tiles
      rasterizacao - Represents if the rasterizacao is turned off (false) or on (true)
      foodSize - Represents the size of the food in tiles
      foodType - Represents the class of the food ("Circulo" or "Quadrado")
      foodScore - Represents how many points each food gives to the player when he eats it
      obstacles - Represents the file of obstacles
      gameUI - Represents the user interface of the game
      leaderboard - Represents the file of leaderboard
